sources.full_text_concat:
Jātinirākṛti
	    Jitāri
	  Jitāri: Kleine Texte
	    Jitāri
	    Gudrun Bühnemann
	    Arbeitskreis für tibetische und buddhisitsche Studien Universität Wien
	      Wien
	      1982
	      30-38
	  Wiener Studien zur Tibetologie und Buddhismskunde
	    8
	  Kleine Texte is an edition of: Vedāprāmāṇyasiddhi, Sarvajñasiddhi, Nairātmyasiddhi, Jātinirākṛti, and *Īśvaravādimataparīkṣa. Bühneman's edition is based on the manuscript described below.

content.value: . Bühneman's edition is based on the manuscript described below.

Line breaks: In the source file, there were two types of line breaks: returns (and possible surrounding space) and hyphens+returns. These were replaced with lb-elements. The ed-attribute "gb" refers to Bühnemann's

items.text: Line breaks: In the source file, there were two types of line breaks: returns (and possible surrounding space) and hyphens+returns. These were replaced with lb-elements. The ed-attribute "gb" refers to Bühnemann's 1982 edition.

content.value: The glass plate numbers were encoded as pb-elements with the edRef-attribute "#jāni-ms".
The corresponding page an line number in
's editions were encoded as pb-elements with the edRef-attribute "#jāni-T" and "#jāni-I" respectively.

items.text: The corresponding page an line number in Tucci's and Iyengar's editions were encoded as pb-elements with the edRef-attribute "#jāni-T" and "#jāni-I" respectively.

content.value: The variant readings in the footnotes were enclosed in a

items.text: The variant readings in the footnotes were enclosed in a .

content.value: References were enclosed in a ref-element.

items.text: Square brackets were encoded as surplus. This follows Bühnemann 1982 p. 48: [ ] auszulassen.
Angle brackets were encoded as supplied. This 	follows Bühnemann 1982 p. 48: < > zu ergänzen.

content.value: The footnotes were encoded as note-elements with their corresponding n-attribute. The footnote references were replaced with the corresponding note. Line breaks in the notes have been removed
Abbreviations used in the cRef-attributes in this file. The editions are those consulted by Bühnemann:

children.text: Dieser Text gehört wie wahrscheinlich auch der folgende zur Sammlung der vādasthānas Jitāris. Er ist bereits von TUCCI

ediert worden. TUCCIs Text weist mehrere Lücken auf und gibt viele von IYENGARs Manuskript abweichende Lesarten. IYENGAR hat in seiner Edition TUCCIs Edition benutzt, hat jedoch die abweichenden Lesarten nicht verzeichnet.

Das vorliegende Manuskript kommt in seinen Lesarten TUCCIs Manuskript sehr nahe, weist aber nicht die dort vorhandene Lücke (57.27; vgl. IYENGAR 76.4-77.15) auf. Dafür bricht der Text 58.14 (TUCCI) bzw. 79.5 (IYENGAR) ab. Möglicherweise befindet sich der Schluß des Textes auch unter den unlesbaren Teilen des Manuskripts. Der erhaltene Text umfaßt die Folios IB|2|9; IA|2|9; IIB|4; IIA|4; IIB|5; IIA|5; IIB|7; IIA|7; IIB|8; IIA|8. [...]

Für die folgende Edition wurden die Lesarten des vorliegenden Manuskripts zur Grundlage genommen, die sich in vielen Fällen mit TUCCIs Text decken. Dem letzten Teil, der im Manuskript nicht mehr erhalten ist, wurde TUCCIs Text zugrundegelegt. Das gleiche Prinzip gilt beim Gebrauch der Daṇḍas. IYENGARs Text ist an vielen Stellen ausführlicher und bringt einfachere Lesarten.
tatra tāvad ādau jātivāda eva nirākriyate |
na hi vyaktibhyo bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ śakyam abhidhātum
tat tāsāṃ sāmānyaṃ nāma | yat khalu yato 'rthāntaraṃ
na tat tasya sāmānyam | yathā gor aśvaḥ | arthāntaraṃ ca gor
samaveta iti katham asau gavāṃ sāmānyaṃ syād iti kuto viśe
ṣābhāvaḥ | tad ayam anaikāntiko hetuḥ katham iṣṭasiddhaye
manyetāḥ | saty api anekārthasamavāye yad eva sa
reṇa | tathā ca tad asāmānyam eva
na tarhi teṣāṃ sāmānyam asti | samānānāṃ hi
svayam asamānasvabhāvā api tenaiva samānās ta iti cet |
na tāvat kriyante teṣāṃ svahetubhir eva kṛtatvāt | kṛtasya ca
evaṃ tarhi tad eva samānaṃ rūpaṃ sāmānyena kriyata
arthāntaram eva tad bhavatu na kiṃcid aniṣṭam āpadyata
taṃ syāt | tathā ca tad api
samānatvāt samānam avayavyāder api kiṃ na syād ity asmadīye
yad idaṃ gotvaṃ goṣv anuvṛttipratyayakāraṇaṃ tat kiṃ gavi varttate āhosvid agavi
yadi tāvad gavi prāk gotvayogād gaur evāsāv iti vyarthaṃ gotvam |...
na ca prāk gotvayogād vastu vidyate
na cāvidyamānaṃ gaur ity agaur iti ca śakyaṃ vyapadeṣṭuṃ yadaiva vastu tadaiva gotvenābhisaṃbadhyate...
gotvaṃ syāt | api tu yadaiva vastu tadaiva gotvena saṃbadhya
utpannaṃ kiṃ tasyānyena gotvena | athāgorūpaṃ na tarhi tasyā
tasyāgor iti vāśvāder iti vā gotvena
iva gotvena saha saṃbandhaḥ syāt | na hy agor
vaktavyaḥ | kiṃ nu vai bhavān vyaktīnāṃ sāmānyasaṃ
dayati | tathā hy atrāpi vikalpadvayam udayate | kiṃ vyakti
prayogaḥ | vyaktibhyo yad abhinnaṃ tad anekam
tve syātām | prayogaḥ | yad sāmānyād abhinnaṃ na tad bhinnaṃ
ca brūyāt | tasya ca sākṣād ekatvanityatve
anaikāntiko hetuḥ | yady api hi sāmānyaṃ
na sāmānyātmanodeti na vyeti vyaktam anvayāt |
ekādhikaraṇatvaṃ mattonmattetaraḥ pratipadyeta | tathā hi tan
yad eva yat | bhinnaṃ ca tat tasmād
nanu pratītir apratīter bādhikā na tu mithyāpratīteḥ |
na saṃvido yuktibhir asti bādheti cet |
nanu kim iyaṃ rājñām ājñā yenāvicārya gṛhyate
kiṃ punar anumānaṃ lakṣaṇopetam api bādhyate |
tal lakṣaṇam eva dūṣitaṃ syād iti sarvatrānāśvā
atha pratyakṣam eva pratyakṣasya tadābhāsatāṃ bādhyatvāt
sādhayati na tv anumānam ity abhiniveśaḥ |
adhyakṣam avadhārayet | tasmād anumānam eva jvā
tasmān nānaikāntiko hetur ity alaṃ bahubhāṣitayeti
